description:

The space
This is a rare find property for a big group of people or a big family and close to all amenities.
There is 1 kitchen, 1 sitting area, a dining room, a family room, Laundry room, Home office and a powder room on the main floor.

Available for your use are 4 spacious bedrooms (2 upstairs, 2 in the basement). All 4 bedrooms have
4 Queen Beds. There is a $20 /night for each guest after 12.

The recently finished basement ('19) has 2 bedrooms & a gorgeous bath walk-in shower!

Easy access to restaurants and retail.

The space
The space is thoroughly cleaned and disinfected after each stay with particular attention to higher touch areas. It includes a beautiful private bathroom with heated floor, queen size bed, dining area, 55 inch TV, and gas fireplace. The kitchenette has a number of amenities including a mini fridge, microwave, toaster oven, coffee machine, kettle, and blender. Coffee, tea and snacks included. There is also a laundry room with a washing machine and dryer beside the bathroom. The Dow's Lake area is a 5 min drive to TD Place, Glebe neighborhood, Little Italy, Carleton University and Civic Hospital.

neighborhood_overview: Staying in the Dow's Lake area provides the ultimate enjoyment for the outdoor enthusiast. The Dow's Lake Pavillion, located at 1001 Queen Elizabeth Drive, is the hub of the neighbourhood, offering a great place to relax and enjoy the picturesque Rideau Canal. You can enjoy an abundance of recreational activities throughout the year such as cycling in the summer and fall and snow shoeing, skating or cross country skiing in the winter. The Dow's Lake area is a five minute drive to Little Italy, the Glebe, Carleton University, Civic Hospital and Lansdowne Park.

description:
Bright and spacious, newly renovated, 2 bedroom apartment close to downtown Ottawa. Private entrance and one free driveway parking space available, with ample free street parking. Lock code for convenient self check-in. Steps to the Ottawa River bike/walking path. Bike along the river to the canal, bi-ward market, parliament, and more, or take a 15-minute drive into the heart of the city.

The space
Kitchen is equipped with cooking essentials for all of your cooking needs. Private laundry facility in-unit complete with iron and ironing board makes this space convenient for longer stays.

The TV is connected to Chromcast so you can cast directly from your device to the TV.

description:
Welcome to Pleasant Park! This brand-new 3-bedroom apartment is perfect for medical professionals, students, families and more. Need to self-isolate? The unit is fully separated from the apartment above with its own independent ventilation system. In addition to usual cleaning, we disinfect door knobs, faucets, light switches, etc. between guests. We offer free parking and are within walking distance of the Ottawa Hospital, CHEO, Billings Bridge Shopping Centre. Longer stays are also welcome.

The space
Bedroom 1: This is the master bedroom. It has a queen bed, open concept wardrobe, and is located immediately next to the master bathroom.

Bedroom 2: Nestled in the middle of the suite, this 'cozy cabin room' is fully furnished with a double bed, soft linens, bedside tables and dimmable bedside lighting.

Bedroom 3: This room boasts a comfortable queen sized bed, compact wardrobe, and convenient under bed storage drawers.

Master Ba
neighborhood_overview:
ALTA VISTA
Pleasant Park B&B is located in the beautiful Alta Vista neighbourhood which boasts one of the oldest tree canopies in Ottawa. We are only a 5 minute walk from the historic Billings Bridge Estate.

AMENITIES
Groceries, LCBO and restaurants are a short 15 minute walk (or one transit stop) away at Billings Bridge Shopping Centre. Walk (20 min) or drive (5 min) to the canal, Lansdowne and TD Place along Bank Street and enjoy plenty of cafes, eateries, and antique shops along the way.

ACTIVITIES
The Rideau River trail is located at the bottom of Pleasant Park Road. This is an excellent trail for running and cycling in the summer, and cross country skiing in the winter. Paddle boards are available for rent in the summer at Billings Bridge.

The space
ALL New mattress, bed linings, bathroom essentials, 55 inch Roku Smart TV, the host of this apartment is aiming to provide comfortable staying experience to all guests.

Room 1: This is the south facing bedroom. It has a double sized bed, sunny window, and a dresser with mirror.

Room 2: This is bedroom with queen sized beds, sunny window, dresser and nightstand. writing desk and chair are prepared for business travel guest.

Room 3: This is a bedroom with double size beds, for sleeping 2 people. It has two comfortable arm chairs, and balcony that overlooks the Fifth Ave.

A double size sofa bed is available in the living room.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located at Glebe, which is one of the most leafy and historic neighbourhood, situated south of Ottawa's downtown area in the Capital Ward with its northern border being demarcated by Highway 417, the Queensway. It is bounded by the Rideau Canal to the south and east.

The stretch of Bank Street that runs through the Glebe is one of Ottawa's premier shopping areas, with many small stores and restaurants offering a wide variety of services. The Glebe is home to Lansdowne Park which contains TD Place Stadium, where Ottawa's Canadian Football League (CFL) football team and the University of Ottawa Gee-Gees play their home games.

Source: Wikipedia

neighborhood_overview:
Sandy Hill -
Sandy Hill is a neighbourhood in Ottawa, located just east of downtown. The neighbourhood is bordered on the west by the Rideau Canal and on the east by the Rideau River. To the north it stretches to Rideau Street and the Byward Market area while to the south it is bordered by the Queensway highway and Nicholas Street. It is home to a number of embassies, residences and parks. Le cordon bleu operates its Canadian school there, at the opposite end of Sandy Hill from the University of Ottawa.

Byward Market -
Join some friends for brunch, lunch or dinner, and then hit the shops for the highest quality food products, fashions and cutting edge trends. See and be seen until the wee hours at one of our hip nightspots. Morning, noon and night the ByWard Market has something just for you. Established by Lt-Col. John By in 1826, the ByWard Market is one of Canada's oldest and largest public markets. The legendary builder of the Rideau Canal, Colonel By himself

The space
The unit is located on the main floor of a two-storey duplex house. It is an individual and private unit that has just recently been fully renovated.

The main entrance into the house is a common entrance for both the ground level unit as well as the first level unit. Each apartment further has its own entrance with a lock.

Guestsl have full and private access to everything in this unit, including two bedrooms, kitchen, living room, and bathroom.

The space has all of the basic necessities that you will require to enjoy your stay. The kitchen is equipped with a stove and oven, dishwasher, coo
neighborhood_overview:
Hintonburg is a lively and hip neighbourhood. Special features that are just a few minutes away by foot from the apartment include:

1. Wellington Street: home to lots of restaurants and cute stores. A small grocery store is walking distance to the apartment. Large chain grocery stores are better reached by bike, bus, or car.

2. The Parkdale Market: this lively market is open daily from April to November, 6am to 6pm. You can find an array of fresh fruit, vegetables, and plants there.

3. Laroche Park: offers a large open field with two baseball diamonds, a children's play area, and an off-leash dog park.

4. Gatineau River Trail: you can enjoy a relaxing walk, run, bike ride, or (in the winter) cross-country skiing along the river. You can also use the trail for a scenic commute to downtown.

description:
Beautiful, newly renovated two bedroom with parking on a quiet residential street with backyard space and an outdoor patio. Perfect for families and business travellers. Your get away in Canada's capital. A bright and spacious 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom first floor apartment in a safe neighbourhood. 8 minute drive to downtown which is buzzing with farmers markets to Canadian made cheese, maple syrups and beaver tails. Walking distance to grocery stores, restaurants, pubs and much more.

The space
The kitchen is fully equipped with all the necessities, and there are two smart TV's with netflix in the living room and bedroom.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire apartment and a balcony off of the kitchen as well as a small fenced in backyard. This is not a shared space. There is a shared laundry room downstairs with coin operated laundry. There are 4 machines in total so you never have to wait.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Overbook is a rapidly developing neighbourhood located in the east end of Ottawa. It is located across the Rideau River, from the neighbourhoods of Lower Town and Sandy Hill, just to the south Rockcliffe Park, and New Edinburgh.

Small-scale businesses line Donald Street on the neighbourhood's northern area. While the neighbourhood is quiet and residential, it is situated conveniently to St. Laurent Shopping Centre with anchors including Sears and The Bay, along with Bath and Body Works, Guess, SportChek, and many others. Nearby, you can also find The Ottawa Trainyards featuring WalMart and Marshall's. Even more shopping is available on both Montreal Road and Beechwood Avenue.

If you're looking for great Italian food, there is no shortage here in Overbrook. Louis' Restaurant and Pizzeria and Pizzaro's are two excellent, family-friendly restaurants centrally located in the neighbourhood.

neighborhood_overview:
Just minutes away, you will find the Lansdowne park that offers great restaurants/bars, the glebe marketplace for a great shopping experience, a Cineplex VIP movie theater, TD place stadium that hosts games & events, and a farmers market.

If you are a fan of outdoor activities, there is Ottawa's famous Mooney's bay beach, the Vincent Massey Park and the Rideau River, all located nearby.

All along, on bank street, to the confederate building & the Parliament Hill, you have unlimited choices of restaurants, bars, stores, groceries, and Ottawa's very own artisanal shops.

Some places that are in walking distance - Farmboy Grocery Store, Pelican Seafood Market and Grill, Colonnade Pizza, Mavericks Donuts!

-The Tulip Festival

That's just to name a few!

The space

description:
Welcome to my home. This modern apartment is a short walk from Ottawa's best restaurants, shops, and entertainment.

The unit has a large bedroom, a full kitchen, and a dining area. Its spacious living room has a Queen sofa bed and a 60‚Äù smart TV. The kitchen is fully stocked for cooking, and complimentary coffee is provided. There is also a rooftop patio!

There is a paid parking lot nearby for $14/day.

The space
This 1-bed apartment is newly renovated with air conditioning, new furniture, a fully stocked kitchen, and upgraded bathrooms. You'll enjoy top of the line appliances and in-suite laundry.

The Queen bed and the Queen sofa are very comfortable and the 60" smart TV comes with Netflix. There is also a shared rooftop patio for your enjoyment!

Guest access
You'll have complete access to the apartment.

Other things to note
The apartment is on the 3rd floor, up two flights of stairs.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is steps away from the trendy Little Italy district, and a short walking distance to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Byward Market, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

description:
Historic home just off Ottawa's up and coming Beechwood area, steps to the Ottawa & Rideau River; coffee, specialty shops and restaurants.
Minutes to 17.5 acres of sugar bush, in the middle of the National Capital; located less than 5 km from downtown and 2.5 km to Ottawa's historic Byward Market.

Located in a quiet neighbourhood, this contemporary home can sleep 6 (4 adults, 2 children). Very family friendly home and area.

A fully renovated space, with private entrance and street parking.

The space
Recently renovated historic home with parking included.
Modern and open concept, contemporary finishings with everything you need.

Family friendly home and neighbourhood. Many kid friendly parks within walking distance.

Bright windows and lighting, with concrete countertops in the full kitchen with dishwasher.

Loads of free street parking all around.

Guest access
Private entrance
neighborhood_overview:
Less than 5 minute drive to Ottawa's historic Byward Market.
Steps to up and coming Beechwood with coffee shops, specialty shops, grocery and convenience stores.
Walking distance to the Ottawa and Rideau River bicycle and walking pathways.
10 minute car ride to Gatineau Park with beautiful cycling and hiking, walking trails and beaches.

description:
This cozy, spacious & bright room is located in the heart of the National Capital Region (Centretown area). This beautiful room is ideal for a single or duo travelers looking for the comforts of home, while away. Located just minutes away from all main attractions, like Parliament Hill, the very famous Rideau Canal, museums and more. Steps from great bars, restaurants, cafes, shops/boutiques and groceries. A truly gem in the heart of downtown!!

The space
This a 8 story building, very clean, quiet and save. Neighbours are respectful.

Main city attractions are within walking distance like:
* Parliament Hill - 10 min
* The very famous Rideau Canal - 10 min
* Museums - The museum of History, The War Museum, Museum of Nature, The Royal Mint, The National Gallery and many others - 10 to 15 min
* Rideau Center Shopping Mall - 15 min
*Steps away from various restaurants, bars, cafes, shops/boutiques, also within (5-10 min).
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of the Downtown (Centertown area), 20 min walk to ByWard Market as well as The Rideau Canal with easy access to public transportation (within 5 min. walk) Grocery stores (Massines and Farm Boy) are less than 3 min drive from the building. Lively Irish pubs on Elgin and Bank streets. Very safe and quiet.

description:
Welcome to The North House! Our clean, comfortable and cozy rooms are located in the heart of the Kanata Tech District. We are proud to offer a home away from home; the perfect place to unwind after a busy day of work, travel or recreation. Your stay includes a comfortable private bedroom, with a shared bathroom and high speed WIFI. We look forward to making your stay as easy and peaceful as possible!

The space
Our home is a bright and inviting bungalow located on a corner lot in a quiet and convenient neighbourhood, directly next to extensive and beautiful walking and biking paths. This room is located on the main floor and has a comfortable single bed. On this same floor you'll find the kitchen and laundry facilities. Outside feel free to use the shared patio or relax in the basement rec room with our other travelling professionals.

description:
This modern apartment is a short walk from Ottawa's best restaurants, shops, and entertainment.

The unit has a large bedroom with a Queen bed, a second bedroom with a Double bed, a full kitchen, a dining area, and a work space. Its spacious living room has a Queen sofa bed and a 50‚Äù smart TV. The kitchen is fully stocked for cooking, and complimentary coffee is provided.

The space
This 2-bed apartment is newly renovated, with new furniture, a fully stocked kitchen, and an upgraded bathroom. You'll enjoy top of the line appliances.

The Queen and Double bed are very comfortable, and the 45" smart TV comes with Netflix.

We offer on-site parking for $10/day. Please inquire for further details about obtaining a parking pass. There is also paid parking nearby at 283 Cyr Ave and public transit is a 2-minute walk from the apartment.

Please note guests will have to walk up outdoor stairs to access the unit.

Other t
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the heart of the trendy Vanier district, with easy access to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Byward Market, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

neighborhood_overview:
The Golden Triangle is a small central district known for lively pubs, high-end restaurants, and cafes along its main strip, Elgin Street. The area is also home to several embassies and the Ottawa City Hall complex, with a plaza and pop-up ice-skating rink out front. Leafy Minto Park offers benches and picnic tables, while a paved cycling and walking path lines the Rideau Canal, which borders the neighbourhood.

One of the biggest attractions is the Rideau Canal. Here, you can walk, bike, and skate during the winter. With walking and bike paths and benches, the Canal is a great place to get exercise, and meet other members of the community. In close proximity, you will also find Elgin Street, the National Arts Centre, and the Rideau Centre. You can walk home from the Jazz Festival, Winterlude, or Canada Day festivities. This neighbourhood offers great restaurants and pubs, several parks, and a community centre complete with a pool and tennis courts.

neighborhood_overview: Proximity to everything! neighborhood_overview:
The Bowery Lofts & Condos Centretown location is home to some of the finest outdoor amenities found not only in the city, but in the entire nation.
It is a year-round escape from the ordinary, a playground of vibrant activities in your own backyard.
Skating on the Rideau Canal is the epitome of the Canadian lifestyle ‚Äì chic, active and beautiful. Six months later, it‚Äôs the perfect locale for a quick morning jog before heading out to work, past manicured trails and parklands. If a year-round, active outdoor lifestyle is what you are looking for, Centretown has it.
Biking along the Canal has its own distinctive charm, and you don‚Äôt even need to own a bike; you can rent one from one of the nine Bixi stations set up throughout Centretown.

description:
This brand new and uniquely designed apartment is a short walk from Ottawa's best restaurants, shops, and entertainment in the Byward Market. While located in the heart of downtown Ottawa, this apartment is tucked away in a residential and family filled neighborhood.

The unit features a large bedroom, a den with a sofa bed, a kitchen, a dining area, and two 55‚Äù smart TVs. The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking, and even features complimentary coffee.

Should you drive in, a paid parking lot can be found just a 2 minute walk away for the low price of $10/day.

The space
This modern 1-bed apartment is brand new, with air conditioning/heating, new furniture, a fully equipped kitchen, and a stylish bathroom. You'll enjoy all the comforts of home while enjoying the benefits of being in such a central downtown location.

The Queen bed and the sofa bed are very comfortable and the 55" smart TVs come with Netflix preloaded. We also have
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is minutes away from the Byward Market, with easy access to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

description:
Beautiful, open and bright 2bdr apartment in central Ottawa minutes to downtown! Sunny breakfast nook, walk-in tiled shower and beautiful kitchen with breakfast counter seating. Close to all amenities, accessible from the hwy. Walk the culinary shops of New Edinburgh, spend a day at The Rideau centre or enjoy a delightful dinner at one of the Byward Market's renowned restaurants. With so many nearby attractions, museums and historic sites you'll love being just minutes from downtown.

Guest access
The entire middle floor of the triplex is yours, with in unit laundry.
neighborhood_overview: New Edinburgh is a trendy neighbourhood full of artisan shops, fresh delicatessens, beautiful parks and home of the Governor General's residence. Make time for gourmet dining or a casual share plate at either Frasier's Cafe or Jaspers; both known for amazing, locally sourced, food and hand-crafted cocktails. Take a stroll by the river or check out the falls at either Stanley Park or Rideau Falls Park. Take a tour of Rideau Hall- the Governor General's residence or simply plan a picnic in the beautiful gardens and parks of the residence.

description:
Super cozy apartment close to everything you need withouta car. Either for fun or business you are set in this location. In front or a big bus station that can take you anywhere in the city without ever worrying about the time. There is a beach and parks where you can take walks and relax just minutes (by foot) away.
Carling good mall is 10 minutes away and even Bayshore mall can be reached by foot if you are up for a much longer walk.
View is beautiful all year long.

Other things to note

The elevator can only fit 3 people at a time.
There is no washer and dryer in the unit but there is in the building. Instructions provided when checking-in.
Masks (due to Covid-19 regulations) must be worn at all times in the building common areas
Be aware.

description:
You get your own private bedroom in my two level apartment. The place is spacious but simple, and clean and cozy. My place is definitely among the cheapest in this very central area and that is because I do not run a business out of this. Although the price is lower than average, all amenities for bathroom or laundry for example are inclluded. Clean linens/towels and bathroom essentials are also provided. The common areas (dining room, kitchenette and washrooms) are shared with me, the host.

The space
The space is very cozy, and since this isnt meant to be a business, its very much a friendly and family like environment. There are games rooms downstairs that include a ping pong table, pool table, darts and shuffle board.

The gym is currently closed downstairs but I have my own little set up that you're more than welcome to use.

description:
Modern and trendy apartment in a unit of 4 in the heart of Westboro. Less than 20 minutes from Ottawa airport, steps to the Transitway/LRT access, and less than 20 minutes from downtown Ottawa and the beautiful Gatineau Park. Plenty of bars and restaurants in the neighbouring Wellington and Hintonburg neighbourhoods.

The space
You have the entire place to yourself. After entering through the private door you go up a staircase to the apartment. The apartment is large, spacious and bright. Built in 2018 it has large storage spaces and modern appliances. We‚Äôve been working from home since March and the wifi is powerful to support day long video calls for at least 2 people. There‚Äôs a new and super comfortable king bed in the master bedroom and a memory foam queen bed in the second bedroom. Both bathrooms have heated floors that are not needed, but really appreciated! The smart TV is enabled with Crave, Netflix and Amazon Prime. With Amazon Alexa and Google enabled So

This is a clean, spacious one bedroom apartment on the lower level of a bungalow in Orleans, just 15 minutes from downtown Ottawa.

There are 2 workstations with a desk and chair so you can work from home.

The kitchen is fully equipped with anything you would need to cook a delicious meal!

description:
Welcome to my home. This modern apartment is a short walk from Ottawa's best restaurants, shops, and entertainment in the Byward Market.

The unit has a large bedroom with a King bed, a full kitchen, and a dining area. Its spacious living room has a Queen sofa bed and a 55‚Äù smart TV. The kitchen is fully stocked for cooking, and complimentary coffee is provided.

Please note that we have a STRICT NO PARTY policy to remain respectful of our neighbors.

The space
This 1-bed apartment is brand new, with new furniture, a stocked kitchen, and an upgraded bathroom. You'll enjoy top of the line appliances and the benefits of being in such a central downtown location.

The King bed and Queen sofa bed are very comfortable and the 55" smart TV comes with Netflix. We also have high-tech digital locks along with security cameras for the perimeter.

We offer on-site parking for $15/day. Please inquire for further details about obtaining
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is minutes away from the Byward Market, with easy access to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

description:
This HUGE room is located in the heart of downtown close to all the main hot spots and attractions. There is a beautiful back patio with a BBQ. The room is on your OWN floor and you have your OWN bathroom. You have tons of privacy. The room is located in an updated Victorian character home. The walls are filled with art and there is lots of love in the house. You are minutes away from the bus station, bank street, Gay district, little Itlay, the parliament, and the Byward market.

The space
This bedroom is HUGE. Lots of closet space, a big window with natural light floods the room and I put up blackout blinds in case you like to sleep in. This room is on its OWN floor, but it still in a shared house. You have your OWN bathroom. The only shared spaces are the living room (which I rarely use) and the Kitchen and the backyard. I live (sleep) in the finished basement. There is laundry downstairs and everything you need to cook a meal. My dog Tyson lives in the house.
neighborhood_overview: Centretown is amazing. I have lived here for 8 years so I am a little biased. It is a great mix of million-dollar houses, community housing, and eclectic student housing, it has a little of everything. You are minutes away from so many different areas. I personally love going to Little Italy, which is a 10-minute walk. There is a fenced-in puppy park 3 blocks away.

neighborhood_overview:
WHAT‚ÄôS AROUND?

The property is 60 seconds walk away from three bus stops at the intersection of Cahill drive west and McCarthy; A 15-minute walk (4 minutes bus ride) from a Metro, Scotiabank, quickies gas station, shoppers drug mart, and more; a 20-minute walk (7 minutes bus ride) form Southkeys Plaza. The Plaza has a Walmart, Loblaws, Winners, and more.

The neighborhood is populated by mostly families and elderly folks who enjoy gardening. If you enjoy walks, run and/or bike ride, the area features scenery paths that I can personally recommend. There are multiple parks and a community center only walking distance away.

For information, please contact us. We look forward to speaking to you.

The unit features two large bedrooms, a kitchen, a dining area, and three 55‚Äù smart TVs. It‚Äôs spacious living room also boasts a sofa bed. The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking, and even features complimentary coffee.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is minutes away from the Byward Market, with easy access to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

description:
Welcome to my home. This modern studio apartment is centrally located with easy access to downtown and tucked away in a residential and family filled neighborhood.

This unit features a living area, a kitchenette, a dining area and a laptop friendly workspace. Its modern living area has a King bed and a 55" smart TV. The kitchenette is fully stocked for cooking, and complimentary coffee is provided.

The space
This studio apartment is newly renovated, with new furniture, a fully stocked kitchenette, and an upgraded bathroom. You'll enjoy top of the line appliances and all the comforts of home while enjoying the benefits of being in such a central location.

The King bed is very comfortable and the 55" smart TV comes with Netflix preloaded. We also have high-tech digital locks for peace of mind.

We offer on-site free parking on the laneway.

Guest access
You'll have complete access to the apartment.

<
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the west/central part of Ottawa, and a 15-20 minute drive to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Byward Market, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

description:
This brand new and uniquely designed apartment is a short walk from Ottawa's best restaurants, shops, and entertainment in the Byward Market. While located in the heart of downtown Ottawa, this apartment is tucked away in a residential and family filled neighborhood.

The unit features a large bedroom, a kitchen, a den with a sofa bed, a dining area, and two 55‚Äù smart TVs. The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking, and even features complimentary coffee.

Should you drive in, a paid parking lot can be found just a 2 minute walk away for the low price of $10/day.

The space
This modern 1-bed apartment is brand new, with air conditioning/heating, new furniture, a fully equipped kitchen, and a stylish bathroom. You'll enjoy all the comforts of home while enjoying the benefits of being in such a central downtown location.

The Queen bed and the sofa bed are very comfortable and the 55" smart TVs come with Netflix preloaded. We also have
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is minutes away from the Byward Market, with easy access to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

description:
Located in the Heart of Ottawa, at one of the most unique areas of town called Little Italy. This Modern & Spacious Studio is perfect for vacation or work-related travel. Bus Stop Across the Street with a Subway Station 5 minutes away. Literally 2 minutes away to downtown by bus/car. Free on-street parking day & night. Enjoy new & Renovated kitchen, Sparkling Clean linens, Fresh bedding Sheets, blazing fast wifi, flat screen HD TV w/ Netflix. CLEANING FEE DISCOUNTED ON STAYS FOR 3 NIGHTS OR MORE

The space
Cozy Studio in a Townhouse, with a private washroom, Private kitchen, Wifi and TV access.

Other things to note
CLEANING FEE DISCOUNTED ON STAYS FOR 3 NIGHTS OR MORE.
neighborhood_overview:
Little Italy is a neighbourhood of Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, and the cultural centre of Ottawa's Italian community. Situated in Centretown West, it is bounded by Albert Street to the north, Carling Avenue to the south, the O-Train Trillium Line to the west, and approximately Bronson Avenue to the east, while the neighbourhood's main commercial area is along Preston Street.

Little Italy is adjacent to Chinatown, whose business district centres on Somerset Street.

description:
This modern apartment is a short walk from Ottawa's best restaurants, shops, and entertainment.

The unit has two large bedrooms with King beds, a full kitchen, a dining area, and a work space. Its spacious living room has a 55‚Äù smart TV. The kitchen is fully stocked for cooking, and complimentary coffee is provided.

The space
This 2-bed apartment is newly renovated, with new furniture, a fully stocked kitchen, and an upgraded bathroom. You'll enjoy top of the line appliances.

The King beds are very comfortable, and the 55" smart TV comes with Netflix.

We offer on-site parking for $10/day. Please inquire for further details about obtaining a parking pass. There is also paid parking nearby at 283 Cyr Ave and public transit is a 2-minute walk from the apartment.

Other things to note
1. Pets up to 50lbs ARE WELCOME at our home! The pet fee is $50 per animal.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the heart of the trendy Vanier district, with easy access to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Byward Market, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

description:
Quiet private neighborhood home near a very large selection of stores, shopping and groceries.

This home includes a private kitchen with stove, oven and fridge with all the cookware you need for a homemade meal.

Or you can chose from a variety of top restaurants in the area within a 2 - 5 minute drive (Sushi buffet, Indian food, Farmboy, Pho, Burrito Gringo, Five Guys and much more).


This space is located near Algonquin College as well as near Carleton University.

The space
This cozy suite is in the basement of a house. The entrance is shared with the owners, but the entire suite is private and only for guests.
Lots of closet space and hangers for your clothes.
Space to lounge and watch TV, or enjoy your home-cooked meal.

Guest access
You will access the suite from the house's side door using a smart lock.

description:
Cozy studio apartment situated on a quiet street in Sandy Hill, one of Ottawa's trendiest neighbourhoods in the heart of downtown Ottawa! My place is centrally located and steps away from the University of Ottawa, government buildings, Byward Market, Rideau Shopping Centre and so much more! The ideal location for anyone interested in exploring everything the city has to offer! Can't get better than this!

Accommodates up to 2 people - 1 queen bed

** FREE PARKING AVAILABLE **

This trendy, clean & newly renovated apartment has a full kitchen, full bathroom and 1 queen bed.

Great for business travellers, couples or friends.

- Wi-Fi

- Olive oil, Salt, Pepper, Honey & Sugar

neighborhood_overview:
Check out my GUIDEBOOK for suggestions to restaurants & MORE!

Sandy Hill is a great neighborhood located just East of downtown Ottawa. It borders on the Byward Market and Centertown. Those two neighbourhoods are a bit more lively, while Sandy Hill retains more of a residential feel. But they‚Äôre just a stone‚Äôs throw away, so you‚Äôre never far removed from the action on the weekend.

It‚Äôs ideally located with easy access to the top spots in Ottawa, including the Byward Market, the Canal, Centretown, and the large shopping complex. The community is highly diverse, comprising of students, middle class families, and highly affluent residents. Speaking of which, if you‚Äôre currently attending classes or planning on attending school, Sandy Hill is the best neighbourhood to visit the University of Ottawa.

Excellent place to stay for Ottawa Race Weekend, Canada Day, Winterlude, RBC Bluesfest, Canadian Tulip Festival, Oktoberfest, WESTfest, Ottawa RIBfest, Ottawa PO

description:
Large home in the heart of the Beechwood village. Minutes away from downtown Ottawa. Ideal for large groups. Older home with an added modern touch. Two living rooms, large backyard and front yard. Basement offers a lot of space and makes for extra sleeping arrangements. Includes 2 bathrooms and a powder room.

The space
You have access to the whole house and a parking spot. There is laundry on site for your use. There is also a small balcony. You get a smart tv with many apps to watch all your favoris shows. Also have high speed internet.

The space consists of two queen beds with two full bathrooms upstairs and a third bedroom downstairs with bunk beds and another full bathroom.

Guest access
Home includes washer and dryer. Private entrance and property holds 3 mid sized vehicles on site plus additional free parking on the street.

description:
You'll be in the core of the beautiful Nations Capital!!! Located in the Golden Triangle between Elgin Street on the west and the Rideau Canal on the east. Minutes from Parliament Hill, the Rideau Canal, the historical Byward Market, museums, restaurants, night life, The Rideau Centre and so much more.

Lots of character!

NYC style building!

Professionally cleaned!

Everything is provided such as linens, towels and toiletries!

The unit features a large bedroom, a kitchen, a dining area, and a 55‚Äù smart TV. The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking, and even features complimentary coffee.

There is a STRICT NO PARTY policy. Any violation will result in loss of security deposit and you'll be asked to leave the property.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the heart of the trendy Byward Market district, and a short walking distance to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordique spa, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

description:
LOCATION. LOCATION. LOCATION. Stunning, modern townhouse located just minutes away from downtown Ottawa. Located on a quiet residential street, this house is the best of both worlds with quiet suburban feels in the heart of the city. Fully renovated with modern taste and open concept floor plan. RARE added bonus with attached indoor garage with space for 1 vehicle and added storage as well as 2 outdoor parking spaces.

The space
This place is truly a Gem. Guest will have access to 2 floors of living space plus basement. The backyard boasts a rare but beautiful outdoor oasis in the heart of the city. The home is FULLY equipped for all your needs. Basement can easily be converted to home office space for those working remotely.
neighborhood_overview:
Two phrases can best describe this neighbourhood: The perfect spot for central city lovers, and Rideau Canal enthusiasts. Old Ottawa East is located right off the Canal, so think: Skating and Beaver Tails every winter, with boat rides and gorgeous canal strolls in the summer. Bordered by the scenic Rideau Canal, Colonel By Drive, and Main Street this charming neighbourhood is quiet and eclectic with mostly mature tree-lined streets, giving it a suburban feel while being right in the centre of the city. Old Ottawa East is a wonderful place to live.

With easy access to the 417 East and West onramps, it takes Old Ottawa East residents just a 5-min drive to get to Downtown, Rideau Centre, Landsdowne park, Carleton and Ottawa University campuses. This location truly is an amazing central spot tucked away from the exciting hustle and bustle of downtown living.

neighborhood_overview:

description:
As experienced 5-star Superhosts (check out our other listings), we are proud to introduce you to one of Ottawa's most unique AirBnB stays. Why stay at an ordinary AirBnB when you can stay in this hip pad in the heart of Ottawa's Glebe neighbourhood? You'll think that you've stepped back in time, but without sacrificing the quality and modern amenities that our guests have come to expect. The 1970s come alive with authentic mid-century modern furniture, psychedelic wallpaper, and cozy shag rugs.

The space
While the 70's were great, we didn't think you would want to watch "Jaws" on a 16" black-and-white TV so you'll enjoy the wide-screen, smart 4K TV and high-speed wi-fi so you can enjoy Netflix or premium cable in stunning colour. A selection of vinyl is yours to peruse, but feel free to play your own 70's playlist on the bluetooth-enabled turntable.

To keep the young ones busy - or perhaps just the young at heart - a foosball table and Pac-Man arcade
neighborhood_overview: Several restaurants are less than a 5-minute walk, ranging from eclectic Vietnamese and Mexican/Colombian to McDonald's. The Glebe is know for it's magnificent architecture. Many of Ottawa's former lumber barons, politicians and scions of industry called this part of the nation's capital home.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the heart of the trendy Byward Market district, and a short walking distance to all major downtown attractions as well as Ottawa's finest restaurants, coffee shops, museums, and art galleries.

Nearby attractions include Parliament Hill, Rideau Center, Rideau Canal, Little Italy, China Town, all of the Museums (Canadian War Museum, National Gallery, Canadian Museum of Nature, Canadian Museum of Science and Technology, Canadian Museum of History, and the Canadian Museum of Space and Aviation), Commissioner's Park, Dows Lake Pavillion, several hiking trails, the waterway (popular for kayaking), and Gatineau.

There's also Nordik Spa-Nature, which is a 20-minute drive in Chelsea, Quebec. It is absolutely beautiful with thermal baths and spas. I'd highly recommend it if you're able to go!

WHAT‚ÄôS AROUND?

The property is 60 seconds walk away from three bus stops at the intersection of Cahill drive west and McCarthy; A 15 minute walk (4 minutes bus ride) from a Metro, Scotiabank, quickies gas station, shoppers drug mart and more; a 20 minute walk (7 minutes bus ride) form southkeys Plaza. description:
This beautiful one bedroom apartment in the heart of the vibrant Byward Market. You will find yourself in the middle of Ottawa‚Äôs entertainment district and the most exciting neighborhood. Steps away from museums, Parliament Hill, amazing restaurants, nightclubs, shopping, monuments, park‚Äôs etc. This is the perfect getaway for a couple, solo, adventures, or business travelers. If you‚Äôre looking for a place to rest your head after a day of exploring or a long business day this is the spot.

The space
You are as close as possible to the action yet, you stay on a fairly quiet street.

Guest access
Studio is very clean and tidy. Guest have access to everything in the studio. A comfortable queen size bed, Keurig, toaster, kettle, fridge, microwave, oven, pots, pans, baking dishes, cooking utensils, forks, knives, spoons, cutting board, mixing bowls, plates, bowls, mugs, glasses, smart TV, towels and blankets. neighborhood_overview:
This Beautiful Gem is situated in the Heart of the Byward Market, which is the trendiest part of the city. Everything you need and want is within walking distance from your door. The National Gallery of Canada, Notre-Dame Cathedral and American Embassy is a beautiful 10min walk down the street. You have access to some of the best restaurants in the city, such as Das Lokal which is only 2mins away. Pili Pili Charcoaled grilled chicken which is a must have is just across the street and Bridgehead coffee shop is right around the corner. Don‚Äôt forget to check out the best French Baker which is located on Murray.

If you‚Äôre looking for the night life say no more only 5 minutes away located on Clarence, York and George Street. You will also discover an array of patios and many more restaurants too.

Located on York Street you will find fresh fruits and vegetables at the Farmer‚Äôs Market as well as Le Moulin De Provence where you will find the famous Obama cookie.

description:
Everything has been fully renovated with a European influence plus there is a private 400 square foot backyard deck with lots of trees. It's walking distance to grocery stores and the location is extremely convenient because it's right next to the 417, Tremblay LRT and easy to get downtown. There's parking available in the driveway and I recently finished the laundry room as well. If you like Caribbean and Italian food then you'll enjoy the take-out available right across the street.

The space
Both the first floor full bathroom and the private bathroom attached to the master bedroom were just completed recently. The master bedroom and the spare bedroom are both 11 feet x 13 feet while the first floor bedroom is 8 feet x 11 feet. The house comes equipped with a generous cable package as well as the highest speed internet I could buy.

Guest access
You'll have free access to the entire house including all the spaces shown in the pictures
